title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example exhibits excessive flashing when the window is resized vertically. All tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash during this action.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash when resizing the window vertically.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Control Example. 2. Resize the window vertically. 3. Observe the flashing behavior of the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames.
